title: Green cards (I-551 permanent resident cards, USA)
dataVerified: Name, Sex, A-number, DOB, date valid from-to
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Photo (when verified, matching the photo on the card). Revocation date (if revoked). Superseded date (if superseded). Link to USCIS systems (US government officials only, requires login)
rationale: I-9 employment verification; prevents fake green cards; USCIS domain binding. Holders don't need to carry the physical card permanently, reducing theft risk and loss concerns while maintaining verification capability.
